metadata.name: Tutorial Situations - Work for Shelter
metadata.description: Tutorial work situations: Elena (Social) and Thomas (Physical)
metadata.author: Wayfarer Team

situations.name: Help with Evening Service
situations.description: Assist Elena managing the evening crowd. One hour of work serving drinks and managing tables. Social engagement, uses Focus.

situationCards.name: Competent Service
situationCards.description: Move through the common room with practiced ease. Drinks delivered, conversations managed, chaos ordered. Elena notices your skill.

situations.name: Warehouse Loading
situations.description: Heavy crates need moving before the morning shipment. Physical labor, but pays well. Uses Stamina.

situationCards.name: Loading Complete
situationCards.description: Crates moved, shipment ready. Thomas nods approval and hands over payment. Hard work, fair pay.
